reviewText: Great people. The sex scenes could be filmed better. Otherwise really nice
I great movie for lesbian households.

Director Tony Comstock does more than just shoot his subjects having sex--he talks to them about their sex lives, and he creates a warm and inviting environment where they can be themselves, open up, bring their own toys, and then have fun and play. The interview parts are fascinating and in depth, with some discussion of gender and power dynamics, how they met, what they like to play with.

It's rather rare to see submissive masculine of center queers in porn, so I particularly enjoyed that dynamic.

Excellent film, worth seeing. Glad I have it in my collection so I can watch it anytime.
